Snarfinate: verb - to engage in a friendly competition of sorts in which both participants try to consume the most surprising dish, typically involving unusual food combinations or unorthodox methods of preparation.
Jollup: noun - the act of finding joy or pleasure in the presence of others or enjoying a shared activity, similar to the concept of schadenfreude but without negative connotations.
Thwinkle: verb - to make things sparkle or shine, as in to sprinkle or throw them with sparkles.
Fumblux: verb - to bumble around or make an attempt at something without much skill or competence, often resulting in a humorous or chaotic outcome.
Flobberoll: noun - a device that combines the functions of a smartphone, smartwatch and fitness tracker, all in one sleek and compact form factor.
